title: No. 21 Tech seeks to slow No. 2 Miami in Blacksburg - VT hokiesports.com
content: No. 21 Tech seeks to slow No. 2 Miami in Blacksburg  VT hokiesports.com
description: Hosting a top-25 series, the No. 21 Virginia Tech baseball team (21-8, 7-6 ACC) will look to smother the nation's longest winning streak this week when it crosses bats with No. 2 Miami (27-6, 13-2 ACC) during a three-game series at English Field at Atlantic Union Bank Park (April 14-16).
